author: ate
msg: Fixing the weird /desktop bug with disappearing action icons.
This turned out to be an localization issue with the DecoratorAction.actionName.
In the /desktop, the action image url is constructed using the actionName while in the /portal its using the action.linkURL.
As the actionName was localized too (minimzed -> Minimize), the /desktop couldn't find the image anymore.
Fixed by no longer localizing the actionName.
